summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 15
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Wednesday, with two gaining and 16 declining.
Bitcoin fell 2.2% to $24,330 by market close.
